attributes.action: Grant free British citizenship to Europeans with settled status
attributes.additional_details: I believe it’s important in these times of uncertainty and a fast-developing World to start to fix partially what inflation and Brexit have done to the British economy, and give settled Europeans in the UK some reassurance about their future.
attributes.background: We urge the Government to grant Europeans who have settled status in the UK with British citizenship on request, without any cost in money.
